alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 8:28PM CDT until June 03 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Ellis County in north central Texas... Northwestern Navarro County in north central Texas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 828 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ennis, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Ennis, Blooming Grove, Bardwell, Alma, Barry, Bardwell Lake, Rice, Garrett, Emhouse, Reagor Springs, Crisp and Howard. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 235 and 256. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
